docs.snippet: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick's recent decision to not stand during the national anthem as a way of protesting police killings of unarmed black men has drawn support and scorn far beyond sports. The Associated Press explains how...
docs.lead_paragraph: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick's recent decision to not stand during the national anthem as a way of protesting police killings of unarmed black men has drawn support and scorn far beyond sports. The Associated Press explains how "The Star-Spangled Banner" became a ritual of American public life, its complicated racial origins and how the song has been used as a form of political resistance.

headline.main: AP Explains: Why National Anthem Is Patriotism, Protest Icon
headline.print_headline: AP Explains: Why National Anthem Is Patriotism, Protest Icon

docs.snippet: Tatyana McFadden, who with her mother has fought for students with disabilities to participate in sports, could leave the Rio Paralympics with seven gold medals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tatyana McFadden, who with her mother has fought for students with disabilities to participate in sports, could leave the Rio Paralympics with seven gold medals.
docs.abstract: Tatyana McFadden of Clarksville, Md, is set to compete in every wheelchair racing event at 2016 Paralympic Games; Tatyana's sister Hannah will also compete in three events, making it possible for them to become first siblings to stand side-by-side on Olympic podium.

headline.main: A Paralympian Races to Remove Obstacles for the Next Generation

docs.snippet: A quarterback makes a statement on racial justice, playing for a city that is getting richer and whiter every day....
docs.lead_paragraph: A quarterback makes a statement on racial justice, playing for a city that is getting richer and whiter every day.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by black 49ers fan Gerald Harris asserts critics of protest against national anthem by San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick are implicitly questioning his right to express his humanity; argues Kaepernick's stand has special resonance in San Francisco, where black population has declined and gentrification has negatively impacted lives of those remaining.

headline.main: What Colin Kaepernick’s Protest Looks Like to a Black 49ers Fan

docs.snippet: GAME OF THE WEEK: No. 22 North Carolina vs. No. 18 Georgia, in Atlanta. Three SEC-ACC matchups headline opening weekend, but the Tar Heels' trip to Atlanta stands out because it's the only one of them in which the ACC team is lower-ranked. North C...
docs.lead_paragraph: GAME OF THE WEEK: No. 22 North Carolina vs. No. 18 Georgia, in Atlanta. Three SEC-ACC matchups headline opening weekend, but the Tar Heels' trip to Atlanta stands out because it's the only one of them in which the ACC team is lower-ranked. North Carolina had a breakout 2015 season, reaching its first ACC championship game after winning the Coastal Division, and the best way for the Tar Heels to prove their staying power is by knocking off the Bulldogs in a de facto road game and in Kirby Smart's debut as Georgia coach. "We understand the importance of it," UNC fifth-year coach Larry Fedora said.

headline.main: UNC-Georgia, FSU-Ole Miss Headline Week 1 in ACC
headline.print_headline: UNC-Georgia, FSU-Ole Miss Headline Week 1 in ACC

docs.snippet: The Australian Olympic Committee (AOC) will ask Brazilian authorities to expunge records of criminal proceedings against nine athletes who were detained at the Rio Olympics after their accreditation passes were tampered with after an investigation...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Australian Olympic Committee (AOC) will ask Brazilian authorities to expunge records of criminal proceedings against nine athletes who were detained at the Rio Olympics after their accreditation passes were tampered with after an investigation labeled the criminal process "oppressive".

headline.main: Australia Seeks to Have Detained Athletes' Records Cleared
headline.print_headline: Australia Seeks to Have Detained Athletes' Records Cleared
